name: Dan Peterson
biography: Dan is a Product Manager on Google Wave, especially focused on the API platform, open source, and the federation protocol. Prior to that, Dan helped establish the OpenSocial specification, Apache Shindig, and co-founded the OpenSocial Foundation. Previously, Dan guided the Google Web Toolkit (GWT) team as it became an open source project and worked on Google’s infrastructure team on web search and data center management. Dan earned a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, as well as minors in Technology & Management and philosophy.
